{ "id": 5555936, "name": "Rdio Music", "developer": "Rdio", "icon": "https://lh3.ggpht.com/8nViHFOwanUFQwW_o_Ywb4iEMDjbNUnYrOn-BnaMAoLYC8jTcuOBaNZUrhxOF0_i5w", "vendor_identifier": "com.rdio.android.ui", "ref_no": null, "sku": "com.rdio.android.ui", "package_name": "com.rdio.android.ui", "store_id": 2, "store": "google_play", "storefront": "google_play", "release_date": "2011-12-01T23:21:16", "added_date": "2011-12-02T23:21:16", "updated_date": "2015-09-30T03:49:31", "version": " Varies with device ", "source": null, "type": "unknown", "devices": [ "Handheld" ], "bundle_identifier": "com.rdio.android.ui", "price": { "currency": "USD", "price": "0.00" }, "all_rating": "3.93", "all_rating_count": "162814", "description": "
Rdio provides over 35 million songs to discover, play, and share.

With Rdio, you can:
- Enjoy endless stations based on artists, genres, moods and themes, along with You FM, your own personalized station.
- Play albums, songs, and playlists.
- Listen on your phone, tablet, computer, and other devices such as Sonos and Chromecast.
- Download songs for offline listening.
- Follow friends, artists, and other music lovers.

- Tour Dates at Your Fingertips. If an artist is playing near you, you’ll see a green “On Tour” icon at the top of their page, letting you know when you can catch them live. You can even tap through to purchase tickets.
\n
- Various UI improvements and minor bug fixes.
